name: 陳奕宏
objective: 介紹化工程序中物質於一系統中流進、流出間質量、能量均衡之原理與計算，使學生學習列出質能均衡之基本式子並查尋相關文獻，手冊上所登錄之物性資料以解決問題。
schedule:
週次　　授課內容

1　　Ch 1. Introduction
        Ch 2.1 Systems of Units 
        Ch 2.2 Conversion of Units

2　　9/19 中秋節連假

3　　Ch 2.3 Dimensional Consistency
        Ch 2.4 Significant Figures
        Ch 2.6 The Mole and Molecular Weight

4　　Ch 2.8 Density and Specific Gravity
        Ch 2.9 Concentration
        Ch 2.7 Choosing a Basis

5　　10/10 國慶日連假

6　　Ch 2.10 Temperature        
        Ch 2.11 Pressure
        Ch 3.1 Introduction to Material Balances

7　　Ch 3.2 A General Strategy for Solving Material Balance Problems

8　　Ch 4. Solving Material Balance Problems for Single Units Without Reaction

9　　期中考試

10　　Ch 5.1 Stoichiometry
        Ch 5.2 Terminology for Reaction Systems

11　　Ch 5.3 Species Mole Balances
        Ch 5.4 Element Material Balances
        Ch 5.5 Material Balances for Combustion Systems

12　　Ch 9.1. Energy: Terminology Associated with Energy Balances
        Ch 9.2 Types of Energy to Be Included in Energy Balances

13　　Ch 9.3 Introduction to Energy Balances for Processes Without Reaction

14　　Ch 9.3 Energy Balances without Reaction

15　　Ch 9.3 Energy Balances without Reaction

16　　Ch 10. Energy Balances: How to Account for Chemical Reaction

17　　Ch 10. Energy Balances: How to Account for Chemical Reaction

18　　期末考試
scorePolicy:
1.成績計算：小考及作業25%，期中考 25%，期末考 30%，平時成績 20%。
2.注意事項：上課需專心，禁止講話與其他影響他人上課之行為。上課點名，若有不克出席的情況，請上課之前請假，缺課過多將列入總成績評比參考。考試嚴禁作弊，違者嚴辦。
materials:
1.教材書目：
(1) D.M. Himmelblau and J.B. Riggs, Basic Principles and Calculations in Chemical Engineering, 8th, U.S.A, Prentice Hall PTR, 2012 (書號：ISBN 0-13-283556-8)
